result.eng: The trouble is worth the benefit.
result.ga: Is fiú an tairbhe an trioblóid
result.orig: Is fiú an tairbhe an trioblóid
result.html: Is fiú an tairbhe an trioblóidThe trouble is worth the benefit.
result.ponchtml: Is fiú an tairḃe an trioblóidThe trouble is worth the benefit.

result.eng: I guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ga: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.orig: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.html: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟiú an tairḃe an trioblóid b'ḟéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
